fanbox-add: Button text used together with {{msg-mw|fanbox-add-fanbox}}; shown when you click on a userbox that you don't yet have on your social profile page; shown on other users' social profile pages, Special:TopUserboxes, Special:ViewUserBoxes and individual UserBox: pages.
fanbox-categories-help: Help message about categories and their meaning, shown on Special:UserBoxes; the section's title is {{msg-mw|fanbox-categories-label}}
fanbox-categories-label: Header text for the categories section of the userbox creation tool, Special:UserBoxes. Below this is the help message ({{msg-mw|fanbox-categories-help}}) and the actual category tag cloud.
fanbox-choose-another: An error message shown on Special:UserBoxes if the user attempts to give the new userbox an invalid title (a title probably containing one or more of the [[mw:Manual:$wgLegalTitleChars|explicitly blacklisted characters which cannot be used on page titles]])
fanbox-create-button: Button text on Special:UserBoxes, pressing the button labeled with this message creates the user box (or at least attempts to)
fanbox-created-by: A label message shown on Special:TopUserboxes
fanbox-hash: An error message shown on Special:UserBoxes if the user attempts to create a user box where the title contains the hash character (which is [[mw:Manual:$wgLegalTitleChars|not permitted on MediaWiki page titles]])
fanbox-members:
Used to Special:TopUserboxes to indicate how many users have the userbox in question on their social profile pages.
Parameters:
* $1 is the amount of users who have the userbox on their profiles
fanbox-mustenter-left: An error message shown on Special:UserBoxes when trying to create a new userbox that's missing its left-side contents, either an image or text
fanbox-mustenter-right: An error message shown on Special:UserBoxes when trying to create a new userbox that's missing its right-side text
fanbox-mustenter-right-or: An error message shown on Special:UserBoxes when trying to create a new userbox that's missing its right-side text
fanbox-mustenter-title: An error message shown on Special:UserBoxes when trying to create a new userbox that's missing a title
fanbox-perma: Permanent link text on userboxes, shown in a rather tiny font
fanbox-createfor:
Page title of Special:UserBoxes when creating a new userbox.
Parameters:
* $1 is the name of the userbox being created
fanbox-createfannotloggedin: An error message shown to anonymous users when they try to access the userbox creation tool at Special:UserBoxes
fanbox-updatefan:
Page title when updating an existing userbox via Special:UserBoxes.
Parameters:
* $1 is the name of the userbox being updated
fanbox-instructions: Instructions on how to create a new userbox, shown on the top of Special:UserBoxes
fanbox-display-image: Link text used on Special:UserBoxes; clicking on this link switches the left side from a text-based input to an image uploading form, allowing the user to instead upload an image to be used on the left side of the userbox.
fanboxes-image-picker-launch-button: Button text of a button shown on Special:UserBoxes; clicking on the button displays an image picker which allows the user to choose a pre-existing image (either stored on the local wiki or uploaded to a shared media repository, such as Wikimedia Commons) instead of uploading an image to use on the userbox they're creating or editing via the special page
fanboxes-image-picker: Header label for the image browser on Special:UserBoxes
fanboxes-image-picker-select:
Button for selecting an image on Special:UserBoxes
{{Identical|Select}}
fanbox-charsleft: Hint message used on Special:UserBoxes to inform the user about how many more characters they can type into the left or right side of a fanbox. Parameters: * $1 is '''not''' a number but rather an <input> HTML element which contains the amount of characters left and this amount is automatically updated by the relevant JavaScript code as the user enters text.
fanbox-leftsideimage: Header used on Special:UserBoxes, shown when the user clicks on the {{msg-mw|fanbox-display-image}} link (i.e. thus not shown by default)
fanbox-maxchars-sixty: Hint message used on Special:UserBoxes to indicate that userboxes' titles are limited to only 60 characters
fanbox-upload-new-image: Link text, shown on Special:UserBoxes after the user has uploaded an image for the userbox; clicking on this link shows the uploading form again and allows them to upload a different image instead.
fanbox-update-button: Button text used on Special:UserBoxes when editing a pre-existing userbox (as opposed to creating a new userbox)
fanbox-userdoesnotexist: An error message shown on Special:ViewUserBoxes when trying to view the userboxes of a user who doesn't exist
fanbox-woops: Error message shown on Special:ViewUserBoxes when trying to view a nonexistent user's userboxes. The page title is {{msg-mw|fanbox-woops-title}}.
fanbox-userbox-category:
Name of the category to which the user's userboxes are categorized by default.
Parameters:
* $1 is the user's username (not always passed to the message...FIXME, I suppose)
fanbox-summary-new: An edit summary for when a new userbox is created via Special:UserBoxes
fanbox-summary-update: An edit summary for when an existing userbox is updated via Special:UserBoxes
fanbox-addfan-exists: Error message shown when trying to create a userbox with a title identical to that of a pre-existing userbox
fanbox-list-title:
Page title for Special:ViewUserBoxes.
Parameters:
* $1 is the name of the user whose user boxes you're viewing on the special page
fanbox-back-link:
Navigation link used on Special:ViewUserBoxes.
Parameters:
* $1 is the name of the user whose user boxes you're viewing on the special page
fanbox-count:
Text shown on Special:ViewUserBoxes.
Parameters:
* $1 is the name of the user whose user boxes you're viewing on the special page
* $2 is the amount of userboxes they have
fanbox-embed: Label for an input which allows users to easily copy-paste the wikitext code for embedding a userbox on their wikitext user page or any other non-[[mw:Extension:SocialProfile|social profile]] page
fanbox-remove: Button text used together with {{msg-mw|fanbox-remove-fanbox}}; shown when you click on a userbox that you currently '''do''' have on your social profile page; shown on other users' social profile pages, Special:TopUserboxes, Special:ViewUserBoxes and individual UserBox: pages
fanbox-remove-fanbox: Confirmation message shown when you click on a userbox that you currently '''do''' have on your social profile page; shown on other users' social profile pages, Special:TopUserboxes, Special:ViewUserBoxes and individual UserBox: pages.
fanbox-add-fanbox: Confirmation message shown when you click on a userbox that you don't yet have on your social profile page; shown on other users' social profile pages, Special:TopUserboxes, Special:ViewUserBoxes and individual UserBox: pages.
fanbox-add-fanbox-login: A message shown to anons when they click on a userbox; shown on users' social profile pages, Special:TopUserboxes, Special:ViewUserBoxes and individual UserBox: pages.
fanbox-successful-add: Message shown after adding a new userbox to your social profile page. See also {{msg-mw|fanbox-add-fanbox}}.
fanbox-successful-remove: Message shown after removing a userbox from your social profile page. See also {{msg-mw|fanbox-remove-fanbox}}.
fanbox-users-with-fanbox: A header text shown on UserBox: pages. This is followed by {{msg-mw|fanbox-users-with-fanbox-message}} and the small avatars of the users who have the user box in question on their social profile pages.
fanbox-users-with-fanbox-message: Description text shown on UserBox: pages. This is preceded by {{msg-mw|fanbox-users-with-fanbox}} and followed by the small avatars of the users who have the user box in question on their social profile pages.
fanbox-woops-title: Error page title shown on Special:ViewUserBoxes when trying to view a nonexistent user's userboxes. The actual error message shown is {{msg-mw|fanbox-woops}}.
user-fanbox-title: Title of the userboxes section on [[mw:Extension:SocialProfile|social user profile pages]]
fanbox-top-list-is-empty: A message shown on Special:TopUserboxes when there are no top user boxes (ie. no userboxes ''at all'')
